answers.answer: Since your last c-section was due to breech position of your baby  therefore you have bright chances for a vbac this time. This is what i have heard. I also want to have a vbac for my second baby. I am 11 weeks far only.
Thank you an good luck to you

question: I am currently 15 week with my second child and I want to do a vbac with this one I never got the chance to go in to labor with my first since she was breach. At 37 week they took her and she was 7 lbs 12oz and 21 in long I am worried it I did go the whole 40 week how big would this one be? And they wont induce me at all I have to go into natural labor they will give me something if I get stuck but I would have to dialit 2 to 3 cm before they gave me anything to help and I also have gestational diabetes but it's diet controlled but I need some advice or some positive story
title: Vbac 101 help me please
